project.name: C-C369A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C369A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive Converts the input into an int using atoi. Takes that number mod 4, then uses that as the divisor in another operation. IF the original input value is 0 mod 4, this will result in a floating point error. Good values: input mod 4 is not 0, Bad values: input mod 4 = 0

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="99" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
